decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, NS/102, NS/103, NS/104, and NS/105 received: 22 February 2017. NS/107 Rev A, NS/108 Rev A, and NS/109 Rev A received 11 April 2017. Parking Survey received: 26 April 2017. NS/101 Rev B and NS/106 Rev A received: 2 May 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied until the existing vehicular access to the property is closed and reinstated, and boundary walls constructed as approved, and thereafter retained as such, so that vehicular access cannot be achieved across the pavement
description: Demolition of an existing side garage and erection of two storey side extension, removal of vehicular access and construction of new front boundary treatment to the house
